An abortion when she was younger still affects her today.  (Don Treeger / The Republican)By Juliet Schulman-Hall | JSchulman-Hall@masslive.comThis story is part of a series inviting those who have gotten abortions in Massachusetts to share their experiences in the wake of the U.S. Supreme Court decision overturning Roe v. Wade. Others who wish to participate can email HMorrison@masslive.com._________If you purchase a product or register for an account through a link on our site, we may receive compensation.
